thread.title: Just When You Think Jennifer Lawrence Can't Fit Another Marshmallow In Her Mouth, She Surprises You
thread.title_full: Just When You Think Jennifer Lawrence Can't Fit Another Marshmallow In Her Mouth, She Surprises You

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Just When You Think Jennifer Lawrence Can't Fit Another Marshmallow In Her Mouth, She Surprises You
text:
​The video below from MTV features Jennifer Lawrence and her ​Hunger Games-Mockingjay Part 2 ​co-stars Josh Hutcherson and Liam Hemsworth ​playing a campfire game of "truth or dare." It is also awesome proof of a very unique talent Jennifer has for eating marshmallows.
Before we get to the marshmallows, Jennifer also explains how Josh likes to make spit bubbles (ew). And she doesn't like to wash her hands after going to the bathroom. I'm going to leave that one alone.
 But this video is really all about the marshmallows. Taking a dare, Jennifer guesses she can fit about eight of the gooey treats in her mouth. I'm already a little nauseous thinking about that. She manages to get A LOT of marshmallows into her mouth and then (of course) shares a story about how it reminded her of an embarrassing dating experience.
Bless you, J-Law and your enviable marshmallow game.
